full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SH'AKYA BTZUN BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI, NGAG RNAMS PHYOGS SU BSGRIGS PA LAS, ,YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO SENG GDONG MA'I, ,BSKANG GSO DGRA BGEGS DPUNG 'JOMS BZHUGS, ,
